version_description: Time server optimization

- Fixed several crash issues
- Fixed(Optimized) obtaining reward from fishing boat
- Fixed false exposure of icon/name of explorer/dolphin trainer on menu
- Fixed "evolution badge" on more button that shows even if there is no upgradable evolution item
- Fixed creature ability issue
- Fixed shop item's pricing issue
- More minor bug fixes

- Fixed several crash issues
- Fixed(Optimized) obtaining reward from fishing boat
- Fixed false exposure of icon/name of explorer/dolphin trainer on menu
- Fixed "evolution badge" on more button that shows even if there is no upgradable evolution item
- Fixed creature ability issue
- Fixed shop item's pricing issue
- More minor bug fixes

- Fixed offline rewards issues
- More minor bug fixes

- 2 New Habitats
- 3 New Creatures
- Penguin In-Out system
- Max Number of Penguins Display - Max 180 Penguins will be visible on the screen, rest will be stored away.
- New Research Tier - Up to Tier 19
- New Quests - 120 new quests
- New Achievements
- Offline Reward modified to a floating Chest on the Sea. Bugs fixed for Offline Rewards
- Other Bug fixes

Optimizations:
1. Battery consumption issues, in-game performance has been improved
2. Optimized UI/UX

Bugs fixed:
1. Gold isn’t being produced automatically
2. In-game language doesn’t match device language
3. Sometimes offline reward shows 0 coins
4. Incorrect number of creature cards shown when drawing from the Gold Chest
5. Camera mode doesn't load when quickly tapping the camera icon

Optimizations:
1.Battery consumption issues, in-game performance has been improved
2. Optimized UI/UX

Bugs fixed:
1. Gold isn’t being produced automatically
2. In-game language doesn’t match device language
3. Sometimes offline reward shows 0 coins
4. Incorrect number of creature cards shown when drawing from the Gold Chest
5. Camera mode doesn't load when quickly tapping camera icon

1. Xmas Event (Until 2020.1.19)
▶ Merry Xmas! Enjoy the Xmas experience in Penguin Isle!
- Complete a Penguin's wish and get a reward!
- 9 New Xmas Penguins
- 3 New Special Penguins
- 3 New Xmas Creatures
+ Free giveaway gift, collect Xmas gifts EVERY DAY!
+ New Xmas BGM

2. Monthly Card
- The biggest value-worth package with the Jeweler Penguin!
3. Support New language - Indonesian
4.Minor bug fixes

1. Watching ad experience has been improved
2. Minor bug fixes

Happy Lunar New Year! Love is in the air, Hearts are in every habitats!
1. Try your luck with New Year Lucky Draw and have a chance to get special Lucky Bag Penguin and Alpaca!
2. Valentine Day Package
3. New habitats (Bakery, Theater)
4. Adjust game data balance
5. New Quests and Research
6. New Penguins (Popcorn Penguin and Bread Lady)
7. Performance Improvement

* Tips: You can collect back your Christmas Theme Penguins and Decoration from Creature tab by taking in Penguins.

Bug fixes:
- Optimize game crashes
- Fixed loading issues

Bug fixes:
- Fixed loading issues

1. New event “Finding Sunset”, Complete quests and claim big rewards!
* New BGM
* New Environment
2. New Penguins; Baby Fisherman Penguin, Jack Hammer Penguin, Duck Tube Penguin, Antenna Penguin, Gardener Penguin
3. New Habitat; PASA
4. Ad Coupon; Skip ad videos with Ad coupon!
5. Buff; Make your Isle faster with X20 production buff!
6. Adjust habitat unlock balance
7. Minor improvements

Bug Fixes:
1. Optimize game crashes
2. Optimize in-app-purchase experience

Bug fixes:
- Optimize game crashes
- Fixed loading issues

Want to find cherry blossoms this spring? Penguin Isle has brought Cherry blossoms to you! Now, take in the fragrant scents of Cherry Blossom!
▶ Cherry Blossom Event: Complete the mission and huge rewards await you!
* Decoration feature: Plant own your cherry blossom trees and decorate your Isle however you like!
* New BGM and background
* New 6 Penguins
▶ Easter and Cherry Blossom Sale Package

Bug Fixes:
1. Several issues with not getting rewards for unlocking habitats

1. 21st New Habitat: Ferris Wheel - now your Penguins can go on rides too!

Preparing the Anniversary Cake! Let’s light the candles and prepare for Penguin Isle’s 1st Anniversary Party! Update now to take part in the celebrations with us!
1. Anniversary Event
* Cake Penguin, Candle Penguin, Photograph and DJ Penguins and more! Enjoy Festival Penguins and Decorations.
* Anniversary Whispering Stars BGM
* Anniversary Aurora Night Background
2. Anniversary Gem Package Exclusives: 1+1 Gem Discount
3. Habitat Panel’s UX improvement

Something spooky is happening in Penguin Isle this Halloween! Come and experience the thrill of your lives with our Exclusive Halloween Events!
Happy Halloween!

1. Make your Halloween scary by claiming daily!
- Skeleton Penguin, Mummy Penguin!
- Spooky Decorations to scare everyone away!
2. Halloween Package
3. Minor bug fixes

Now, you can own your own customize Penguin in Penguin Isle! Come check it out in the latest version!
▶New Contents
1. Get your own Penguin!
2. Decoration Pick Up System: Housing capacity expanded! Use your Penguins and pick up decorations to increase your housing points!
3. Mileage System: Use your Mileage and exchange for Baby Penguins!
4. Shop Renewal

▶Improvements:
1. Jeweler Penguin upgraded: Now Jeweler Penguin produces 100GEM instead of 50GEM!
2. New store packages updated

▶Feedback Improvement
1. For players who still have a default name, you now have a chance to change name one more time.

▶Bug fixes:
1. User Penguin Guide localization has been optimized
2. Incorrect visuals during user penguin animations
3. Red dot doesn't show in the Shop when ads are available

- Christmas Event Recipe x16

1. Bamboo Lucky Draw Event: Good luck and claim all diverse rewards!

- Panda Penguin
- Waiter Penguin

- Halloween Penguin/Santa Penguin re-appear issue when leave from Mini-Game
